headline: Why Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) Stock Is Trading Up Today
summary: Shares of global entertainment and media company Warner Bros. Discovery (NASDAQ:WBD) jumped 4.6% in the afternoon session after the company rejected an initial takeover offer from Paramount Skydance and received a price target increase from Citigroup.
